nodes.bodyText:
Thanks for looking into this.
I think it looks a bit strange to have this check inside the for loop. Wouldn't it also work to initialize idxCurrentSort with 0 instead?

I tried to figure out the logic in why someone sets it to -1 but couldnt see a reason. Rather than create an issue later, I went with a null check. Nothing unusual was observed if we just start at 0 and it selects the default sort. Pushing the fix.
